comment._content: "Hi, I'm Fred and this is my brother Fred."

comment.author: 46696233@N00
comment._content: www.boxrec.com/list_bouts.php?human_id=039791&cat=boxer Fred McCay was a Canadian with a record of won 8 (KO 5) + lost 14 (KO 11) + drawn 2. accoroding to www.boxrec.com/media/index.php/Fred_McKay he was Brother of fellow boxers Victor McLaglen and Arthur (Young) McLaglen, per the Sept. 10, 1914 Tacoma Daily News (Tacoma, WA, USA)
